snippet.title: Episode001 Amber Prosia Interviewing Marina J
snippet.description:
Welcome to Episode #1 of The Parenting Biz Podcast - coming to you every Monday. This week's featured guest is Marina J. 

When Marina J became a single mum in 2001 her light went out. She couldn’t find anyone to teach her; not just how to turn her life around, but actually how to flourish. 

So she made a decision: She would do it. 

She put herself on her own program and within 6 months her life turned around in a BIG way and her light turned back ON. 

She had what those around her didn’t: A system that took her out of her old life and into the new. 

Since then she’s become a #1 best-selling author, a speaker and a life coach - because your happiness is everything! 

She married the love of her life and lives by the beach near Sydney. 

She’s been interviewed by Channel 9’s breakfast show, ABC radio, Fox Sports Radio, 2GB radio, Body + Soul, Better Health and Gardens, and more. 

Her motto? Is that you’re built to heal; because you’re built to live that life that’s waiting for you!

This week, the entire interview has been constructed around The Grand Opening Night for the most famous show in town - “Ignite Your Power” & Marina J is the main character about to hit the stage! 

We went behind stage with Marina, dove into the four acts of the show, had a remarkable encore and sat back and reflected in the dressing room once the show was over. 

Ignite Your Power demonstrates the foundational core of truly diving inwards to make a difference in not only our personal or business lives but most importantly, in our children’s...

Here are some key points summarised in the four acts:

First Act: Decide What You Don’t Want
First step in igniting your personal power
Lots of self help saying “don’t think negative” = Marina completely DISAGREES.
Pay attention to this natural step or you’ll be worse off in the future
Decipher what’s right for you AND what’s wrong for you
Find and write down where your energy drains are
Worship and trust your B.S detector

Second Act: Desire What You Do
Isn’t that selfish? YES! The best kind of selfish
Start small - example: what do you want for lunch?
Go with your feeling in the here and now - the rest will follow
We’re all energy...

Third Act: Detox What’s In Your Way
Focus on emotional detox
What are you more committed to?
The importance of asking more powerful questions
85% of what’s in our way, lives underneath in our subconscious 
You can talk all you want, but until you go deep - you’ll always be where you are
Real healing = where you won’t walk out of this year with the same problems you walked into this year with
We all hold 50% masculine & 50% feminine energy and truly NEED both
Most of us, need to raise the feminine to match the already high masculine energy we’ve all been taught

Fourth and Final Act: Self-Love Action
Self Love = It’s the act of being kind to yourself
How kind are you being on yourself right now?
Your children learn it from you
If you don’t love yourself, how do you expect your child to love their self?


Looking back and reflecting on your business & life journey, going back to whichever age you choose, what advice would you share with yourself and how old are you?

Marina would go back to her 8 year old self and teach herself to keep some of the energy inwards - to not always give it all away... 

She has always had a great deal of energy, but wasn’t aware of how to manage it and would tend to give it out rather than keeping some in and replenishing herself. 

So she would actually receive and invest in herself and move forward. 

She simply didn’t understand how to contain it... 

Eventually she learned to keep some of it inwards for herself to move forward too. 

Final thought: 
What turns you on?
What turns you off?
Begin asking yourself powerful questions and you’ll be surprised of the wisdom that’s already within you that just wants to be heard. 
If you want to bring out the best in your children, focus on your own healing and that’s the legacy you want to be passing onto the next generation...

Want to contact the guest? 
Receive Glitter Bombs (enter your details on Marina J’s Website): https://marinaj.net/ 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MarinaJCoaching/ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marinajcoaching/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarinaJGoddess

Music in Interview is:
BACK IN SUMMER by Nicolai Heidlas Music https://soundcloud.com/nicolai-heidlas
Creative Commons — Attribution 3.0 Unported— CC BY 3.0 
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/b...
Music promoted by Audio Library https://youtu.be/sGsC98vR4Q4
